title: Simon & Simon S01E13, EXTRA S02E20, EXTRA The Great 80's Flas
description:
Simon & Simon (1982)
S01E13 Tanks For the Memories, EXTRA S02E20 The Secret of the Chrome Eagle, EXTRA The Great 80&#039;s Flashback


S01E13 Tanks For the Memories
First aired: 3/16/1982
When their former high school teacher asks Rick and A.J. to find some missing classmates for the class reunion, the search for Rick&#039;s class president takes them into unsuspected trouble.

Cast: Gerald McRaney as Rick Simon, Jameson Parker as A.J. Simon

Guest cast: John Tuell (Bartender), Burt Marshall (Agent), Gene LeBell (James T. Reedy), Andy Jarrel (Gas Station Attendant), Lance LeGault (Colonel Paul Stark), Clyde Kusatsu (Gerald), Mickey Jones (Ron), Jayson Ingram (Hollins), Tom Hallick (Doug Sullivan), Sandy McPeak (F.B.I. Agent Undercover in Bar), Burr DeBenning (Vincent), Lucille Benson (Mrs. Dorothy Bartlett).

EXTRA - 
S02E20 The Secret of the Chrome Eagle
First aired: 3/3/1983
Rick and A.J. are hired to transport a valuable classic car, a 1935 Cadillac Chrome Eagle Sports Phaeton, to San Francisco but events along the way make them wonder if there isn&#039;t more here than meets the eye. Natalie Schafer guest stars (Mrs. Thurston Howell, Gilligan&#039;s Island).

Cast: Gerald McRaney as Rick Simon, Jameson Parker as A.J. Simon

Guest cast: Shelley Smith (Eleanor Swayze), Dan Ferrone (Burns), Gary Allen (Claude Paxley), Helen Funai (Lisa Chen), Robert Totten (Feltzer), Natalie Schafer (Sophie Chaflin), Joel Lawrence (Colley), Albert Salmi (Sergeant Donegan).
